name: X-Saber Bruno
text: Once per turn, during your opponent's Main or Battle Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using only EARTH monsters you control, including this card. You can only use each of the following effects of "X-Saber Bruno" once per turn. If this card is in your hand: You can banish 1 other EARTH monster from your hand, face-up field, or GY; Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Saber" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand.
